title: The immediate call to the ministry of the Gospel, witnessed by the spirit: vvith a true declaration of the persecution and suffering of Richard Hubberthorne, James Parnell, Ann Blayling, by Will. Pickering, who is Mayor of Cambridge. Also an answer to divers letters and mittimusses, against the said prisoners, answered; by them who are sufferers for the truth, and for the testimony of Jesus, Richard Hubberthorn, James Parnell.
author: Hubberthorn, Richard, 1628-1662.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for Giles Calvert, at the Black-Spread-Eagle at the west end of Pauls,
